General.Name: Henan Tong-Da Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Tong-Da Cable Co., Ltd. researches and develops, and produces wires and cables in the People's Republic of China. It offers ground wires, cloth wires, and contact wires for electrified railway; and power, overhead insulated, fireproof, load-bearing, and control cables, as well as DC cables for rail transit. The company also provides home improvement products; and steel cored aluminum stranded wires, aluminum clad steel stranded wires, aluminum clad steel cored aluminum stranded wires, aluminum alloy cored aluminum stranded wires, aluminum alloy stranded wire, and bearing cables. It also exports its products to 100 countries and regions, including South America, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Yanshi, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Zhijian  Liu
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Board Sec. & Investment Director
